install.name: Content - JWW 1ShoppingCart
install.author: John Wicks
install.description: 1ShoppingCart plugin for Joomla! 1.5. Requires mootools 1.1, Syntax: {jww1shoppingcart product=[0123456]}

param.name: merchantId
param.label: 1SC Merchant ID
param.description: Merchant ID assigned to account at 1ShoppingCart or affiliates

param.name: merchantKey
param.label: 1SC Merchant Key
param.description: Merchant Key assigned to account at 1ShoppingCart or affiliates

param.name: apiURI
param.label: 1SC API URI
param.description: Uniform Resource Indentifier for the API

param.name: checkoutSteps
param.label: Checkout Steps
param.description: Number of 1SC steps to use in the checkout process

param.name: secureMerchantId
param.label: 1SC SecureCart Merchant ID
param.description: Merchant ID used in SecureCart transactions on 1ShoppingCart or affiliates

param.name: secureCartURI
param.label: 1SC SecureCart URI
param.description: Uniform Resource Indentifier for the 1ShoppingCart SecureCart location
